content.text: Uhho is a black gorilla that is much larger than normal humans.
When it was a toy, it resembled a musical chimpanzee toy with cymbals attached to his hands, a frill on his neck, and a conical striped hat.
It took a liking to the Marines' okaki, leading it to follow Sengoku around and carry him when he wished.
Uhho is strong enough to carry Sengoku on his back without any strain. It was also heavy enough to cause cracks in the Corrida Colosseum seats when it returned to its normal self.
At some point in the last ten years, Uhho was turned into a toy by Sugar.
As a toy, Uhho spectated at the Corrida Colosseum. When Sugar was knocked out, Uhho returned to its original form and began rampaging, causing everyone near it to run in fear.

When Sengoku and Tsuru arrived with Marine reinforcements three days later, Uhho took a liking to Sengoku's okaki and hung around him. As the Straw Hat Pirates and their allies escaped Dressrosa, Sengoku rode to Fujitora on Uhho's back.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 75 Chapter 743 (p. 6) and Episode 677, Uhho appears as a toy.
↑  SBS One Piece Manga — Vol. 81, Uhho's name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 80 Chapter 798 (p. 5-11) and Episodes 742–743.
